LanguageData.BuildLewis.label: Build Lewis LMG
LanguageData.BuildLewis.description: Builds the Lewis LMG, God bless the Queen.\nCaliber: .303 British
LanguageData.BuildMG0815L.label: Build MG 08/15 LMG
LanguageData.BuildMG0815L.description: Builds the MG 08/15 LMG, all you need to do is pull the trigger and keep advancing, be a walking tank.\nCaliber: 8mm Mauser Rifle Catridge
LanguageData.BuildMadsen.label: Build Madsen LMG
LanguageData.BuildMadsen.description: Builds the Madsen LMG, is a magazine fed LMG, not any fancy quadstack modern magazine, so gonna reload frequantly if you want to keep shooting.\nCaliber: 7~8mm Rifle Caliber
LanguageData.BuildMG30L.label: Build MG 30 LMG
LanguageData.BuildMG30L.description: Builds the Maschinengewehr 30 LMG, is a magazine fed LMG, not any fancy quadstack modern magazine, so gonna reload frequantly if you want to keep shooting.\nCaliber: 8mm Mauser Rifle Catridge
LanguageData.BuildMG34L.label: Build MG 34 GPMG
LanguageData.BuildMG34L.description: Builds the Maschinengewehr 34 GPMG, use this for any MG role you want.\nCaliber: 8mm Mauser Rifle Catridge
LanguageData.BuildMG42L.label: Build MG 42 GPMG
LanguageData.BuildMG42L.description: Builds the Maschinengewehr 42 GPMG, aka. the "Hitler's Buzzsaw".\nCaliber: 8mm Mauser Rifle Catridge
LanguageData.BuildMG45H.label: Build MG 45/1 Hybrid GPMG
LanguageData.BuildMG45H.description: Builds the Maschinengewehr 45/1 Hybrid GPMG, Wake the f**k up Samurai, We have ammo to burn.\nCaliber: 8mm Mauser Rifle Catridge / 7.62x51mm NATO
